verses.name: Joshua 7:16
verses.text: So Joshua rose up early in the morning, and brought Israel by their tribes; and the tribe of Judah was taken:

verses.name: Joshua 7:17
verses.text: And he brought the family of Judah; and he took the family of the Zarhites: and he brought the family of the Zarhites man by man; and Zabdi was taken:

verses.name: Joshua 7:18
verses.text: And he brought his household man by man; and Achan, the son of Carmi, the son of Zabdi, the son of Zerah, of the tribe of Judah, was taken.
